faqData.question: How does Textile ERP simplify production and supply chain?
faqData.answer: Textile ERP brings procurement, production planning, inventory management and warehousing into a single system. It automates order handling, batch tracking and stock monitoring so you can adapt to demand changes, reduce waste and keep everything running smoothly.

faqData.question: Is Textile ERP suitable for handling multiple product types and variations?
faqData.answer: Yes, it supports a wide range of textile products like yarn, fabric, garments and home textiles with features for managing sizes, colors, designs and custom orders. This makes it easier to handle complex product structures and deliver accurate results without confusion.
